name: everbridge
label: Everbridge
description: Everbridge that provides enterprise software applications that automate and accelerate organizations operational response to critical events. This connector facilitates the automated operations related to incidents, assets, and organizations.

fields.title: Server
fields.description: Specify the server URL of the SCADAfence server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Specify the account route that is configured for your account to access the SCADAfence server.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Specify the API key that is configured for your account to access the SCADAfence server.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Organizations List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of organizations from Everbridge.

operations.title: Get Incident List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of incidents from Everbridge based on the organization ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Organization ID
parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the organization based on which you want to retrieve incidents from Everbridge.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the organization based on which you want to retrieve incidents from Everbridge.

parameters.title: Date Type
parameters.name: dateType
parameters.description: Select the date type of the incident based on which you want to retrieve incidents from Everbridge. You can choose from the following options: Created Date, Last Modified Date, or Closed Date.
parameters.tooltip: Note: DateType will be used with time range of startTime or endTime.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to search for incidents in Everbridge.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to search for incidents in Everbridge.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Specify the ending DateTime from when you want to search for incidents in Everbridge.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ending DateTime from when you want to search for incidents in Everbridge.

parameters.title: Incident Type
parameters.name: incidentType
parameters.description: Select the type of the incident based on which you want to retrieve incidents from Everbridge. You can choose from the following options: Incident, Scenario, or All.
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of the incident based on which you want to retrieve incidents from Everbridge. You can choose from the following options: Incident, Scenario, or All.

parameters.title: Incident Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Select the status of the incident based on which you want to retrieve incidents from Everbridge. You can choose from the following options: All, Open, or Closed.
parameters.tooltip: Select the status of the incident based on which you want to retrieve incidents from Everbridge. You can choose from the following options: All, open, or Closed.

parameters.title: Only Open
parameters.name: onlyOpen
parameters.description: Select this checkbox whether if you want only open incidents should be returned from Everbridge.
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox whether if you want only open incidents should be returned from Everbridge.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specify the number of results, per page, that you want to include in the response of this operation. By default, this is set as 10.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of results, per page, that you want to include in the response of this operation. By default, this is set as 10.
